rules_text:
Trample
[i]God of Strength[/i] – Attacking creatures you control get +2/+0 and have trample.
[i]Divine Accord[/i] – {4}{B}{R}{G}, exile Duma, War Father: Each player sacrifices each creature they control. Until your next turn, players can't cast creature spells. Activate only if you control a creature named Mila.
